statements: UPDATE user_activity SET interaction_type = 'comment' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'Login', activity_timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', interaction_type = 'Click', interaction_content = 'Clicked on the button', performance_evaluation = '{"rating": 3, "comment": "Needs improvement"}' WHERE user_id = 'd1fbfd76-d4f9-4223-b342-72d1b8e291ed'
